content: Patient HL58932, Amara L. Ricci, underwent a comprehensive orthopedic evaluation at Cedar Bluff Orthopedics on 2023-11-14 for recurrent patellar instability. The assessment noted prior conservative treatments failed, recommending surgical intervention. Documentation includes blueOwl Policy #774-32GY criteria for pre-authorization of lateral retinacular release procedures. Dr. Eleanor Wexler noted the patient's unusual case combining athletic overuse with congenital ligament laxity.
